songs.full_title: I Want a Hippopotamus for Christmas (Hippo the Hero) by Gayla Peevey
songs.title: I Want a Hippopotamus for Christmas (Hippo the Hero)
songs.title_with_featured: I Want a Hippopotamus for Christmas (Hippo the Hero)

description.plain:
From wikipedia:

“I Want a Hippopotamus for Christmas” is a Christmas novelty song written by John Rox (1902–1957) and performed by Gayla Peevey (10 years old at the time) in 1953. The song peaked at number 24 on Billboard magazine’s pop chart in December 1953.

body.plain:
From wikipedia:

“I Want a Hippopotamus for Christmas” is a Christmas novelty song written by John Rox (1902–1957) and performed by Gayla Peevey (10 years old at the time) in 1953. The song peaked at number 24 on Billboard magazine’s pop chart in December 1953.

songs.full_title: I Want a Hippopotamus for Christmas by Kacey Musgraves
songs.title: I Want a Hippopotamus for Christmas
songs.title_with_featured: I Want a Hippopotamus for Christmas

songs.full_title: I Want a Hippopotamus for Christmas by Panda Circus
songs.title: I Want a Hippopotamus for Christmas
songs.title_with_featured: I Want a Hippopotamus for Christmas

songs.lyrics:
9 ContributorsI Want a Hippopotamus for Christmas (Hippo the Hero) LyricsI want a hippopotamus for Christmas
Only a hippopotamus will do
Don't want a doll
No dinky Tinkertoy
I want a hippopotamus to play with and enjoy

I want a hippopotamus for Christmas
I don't think Santa Claus will mind, do you?
He won't have to use our dirty chimney flue
Just bring him through the front door
That's the easy thing to do

I can see me now on Christmas morning
Creeping down the stairs
Oh what joy and what surprise
When I open up my eyes
To see a hippo hero standing there

I want a hippopotamus for Christmas
Only a hippopotamus will do
No crocodiles, no rhinoceroses
I only like hippopotamuses
And hippopotamuses like me too

Mom says the hippo would eat me up but then
Teacher says a hippo is a vegetarian
There's lots of room for him in our two-car garage
I'd feed him there and wash him there and give him his massage
You might also likeI can see me now on Christmas morning
Creeping down the stairs
Oh what joy and what surprise
When I open up my eyes
To see a hippo hero standing there

I want a hippopotamus for Christmas
Only a hippopotamus will do
No crocodiles or rhinoceroseses
I only like hippopotamuseses
And hippopotamuses like me too!Embed

songs.full_title: ​Are My Ears On Straight by Gayla Peevey
songs.title: ​Are My Ears On Straight

description.plain:
The B-Side to I Want a Hippopotamus for Christmas.

More famously, in 1997, the song was reworked as “I’m Dancing in the Show Tonight” by Ween.

songs.embed_content: Read “​Are My Ears On Straight” by Gayla Peevey on Genius

annotatable.link_title: ​Are My Ears On Straight by Gayla Peevey
annotatable.title: ​Are My Ears On Straight

body.plain:
The B-Side to I Want a Hippopotamus for Christmas.

More famously, in 1997, the song was reworked as “I’m Dancing in the Show Tonight” by Ween.

songs.full_title: I'm Dancing in the Show Tonight by Ween
songs.title: I’m Dancing in the Show Tonight
songs.title_with_featured: I'm Dancing in the Show Tonight

songs.lyrics:
3 Contributors​Are My Ears On Straight LyricsI'm a little doll who was dropped and broken
Falling off my mommy's knee
I'm a little doll who has just been mended
Now won't you tell me please

Are my ears on straight?
Is my nose in place
Have I got a cute expression on my face?
Are my blue eyes bright?
Do I look all right to be taken home Christmas Day?

When I first came here
Just a month ago
Brought in by a little girl who loved me so
She began to cry
'Til they told her I could be taken home Christmas Day

Christmas Eve is drawing nearer
And I'm getting scared
Wish I could see in a mirror
How I've been repaired

I'll be called for soon
But I'm worried so
Will she love me like she did a month ago?
You might also likeAre my ears on straight?
I can hardly wait
To be taken home Christmas DayEmbed
